ChecklistItem: Generic Code Check which scans configured files for any configured tokens in code folder; Fails if tokens are found.
The Parent POM details should be having groupId='com.raks.eapi'; artifactId ='MuleParentPom'; version='LATEST'.
The property 'mule.maven.plugin.version' should be set to '4.9.0' in pom.xml.
The plugin 'maven-clean-plugin' should be removed from pom.xml.
The plugin 'maven-surefire-plugin:2.22.0' should be removed from pom.xml.
The dependency 'org.springframework.security:spring-security-ldap' should be removed from pom.xml.
The dependency 'org.springframework.security:spring-security-web' should be removed from pom.xml.
The dependency 'org.mule.modules:mule-module-spring-config' should be removed from pom.xml.
The dependency 'com.ibm.db2:db2jcc_license_cu' should be removed from pom.xml.
The dependency 'com.mulesoft.mule.core:mule-core-ee' should be removed from pom.xml.
The dependency 'com.mulesoft.mule.runtime.modules:mule-module-spring-config-ee' should be removed from pom.xml.
The IBM MQ connector's 'cipherSuite' attribute must be 'TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384'.
The dependency 'com.raks.eapi:apimuleutilities' should be added to pom.xml.
The 'minMuleVersion' in mule-artifact.json must be at least '4.9.0'.
The 'javaSpecificationVersions' in mule-artifact.json must be '17'.
The 'secureProperties' element must be present in mule-artifact.json.
The autodiscovery element should be enabled in a Mule configuration file.
The unsupported error expressions (error.errorType;error.muleMessage;error.exception;error.errors;derivatives of any of these too) should be removed.
The property fromApplicationCode or toApplicationCode in the module-loggingconnector:* should be removed.
The DLP related property north.bound.dlp.flag or south.bound.dlp.flag from all the mule xml files and properties files should be removed.
The DLP request queue property (wmq.dlp.requestqueue) from all the mule xml files and properties files should be removed.
The module crypto:jce-encrypt-pbe (also having hard coded default value PBEWithHmacSHA256AndAES_256) implementation in logging flow should be removed.
The module configuration crypto:jce-config should have "type" attribute defines as mandatory.
The token tobase64 from set-variable node in any mule xml file should be removed.
Generic Config Check which Scans configured files for configured tokens in config folder. Fails if tokens are found.
The property 'LogJsonFormat' must be present in all environment .properties files.
The policy property 'rakspolicyproperty2.policypropname' and 'rakspolicyproperty' must be present in all environment .policy files.
The Secure encrypted properties must follow the pattern: secure::<name>=^{<encrypted-value>=}.
The authorization policy client ID mappings must follow the pattern: truist.authz.policy.clientIDmap.<METHOD>:/<path>=<id>:<name>;<id>:<name>;...
